game.name: Remembrance
game.shortDescription: Step into the fractured mind of a dying scientist in Remembrance, a mind-bending VR puzzle adventure. Piece together broken memories, uncover devastating truths, and decide the fate of a world teetering on the edge of collapse. Will you save humanity?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the fractured mind of a dying scientist in Remembrance, a mind-bending VR puzzle adventure. Piece together broken memories, uncover devastating truths, and decide the fate of a world teetering on the edge of collapse. Will you save humanity?
